Class CommandParser

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.main.CommandParser
public class CommandParser extends Object
Parses user commands and creates corresponding Command objects.

  • Method Details

    • parse

      public static Command parse(String line, Role role, User user) throws IOException, FlightBookingSystemException
      Parses a command line and returns the appropriate Command object.
      Parameters:
      line - the command line input
      role - the user's role
      user - the current user
      Returns:
      a Command object
      Throws:
      IOException - if input reading fails
      FlightBookingSystemException - if command is invalid

    • readIntWithRetry

      public static int readIntWithRetry(BufferedReader br, String prompt, int minValue) throws IOException
      Reads an integer from user input with retry logic. Keeps prompting until a valid integer >= minValue is entered.
      Parameters:
      br - BufferedReader for input
      prompt - the prompt to display to user
      minValue - the minimum acceptable value (inclusive)
      Returns:
      the validated integer input
      Throws:
      IOException - if input reading fails

    • readDoubleWithRetry

      public static double readDoubleWithRetry(BufferedReader br, String prompt, double minValue) throws IOException
      Reads a double from user input with retry logic. Keeps prompting until a valid double >= minValue is entered.
      Parameters:
      br - BufferedReader for input
      prompt - the prompt to display to user
      minValue - the minimum acceptable value (inclusive)
      Returns:
      the validated double input
      Throws:
      IOException - if input reading fails
